snippet.title: Terra Battle 2 Official Trailer ver.2.0
snippet.description:
TERRA BATTLE 2 credit
Producer: Hironobu Sakaguchi (Mistwalker)
Sound: Nobuo Uematsu (Dog Ear Records)
Main Character Design: Kimihiko Fujisaka (Mistwalker)
Development: Silicon Studio Corp.

(C)Mistwalker/Silicon Studio Corp.

TERRA BATTLE 2 related links.
 - official site: http://www.terrabattle2.com
 - official Twitter: https://twitter.com/terrabattle2en
 - official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/terrabattle2

*Please subscribe Mistwalker channel for getting our future information
http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=Mistwalkerchannel
